# howl

cry > call > howl

kū 哭 < 吅犬 口 koǔ 犬 quǎn 𓍿𓊃𓅓𓃡 czyιm

𒌨 ḪUL

4287 嗥 hao2 howl/bawl/bark/roar háo:嗥:⿰口皋 koǔ gaō
3241 嚎 hao2 Howl ++ 号 hao2/hao4 吼 hou3 呼 hu1 hoot howl/bawl háo:嚎:⿰口豪 koǔ haó
3161 唬 hu3 howl tiger's roar/to fool xiāo:唬:⿰口虎 koǔ hǔ
2151 吼 hou3 HOWL roar (of a lion) hǒu:吼:⿰口孔 koǔ kǒng
1835 唤 huan4 howl to call huàn:唤:⿰口奂 koǔ huàn ⇔ hǎn:喊 𓃡 hound
1210 哭 ku1 howl? to cry/to weep kū:哭:⿱吅犬 ? quǎn
843 呼 hu1 HOWL/hoot/YU 语 to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale hū:呼:⿰口乎 koǔ hū
487 号 hao2/hao4 HOWL roar/cry/day of a month//(ordinal) number haó:号:⿱口丂 koǔ

GER 𒈦𒄘𒃼 Tiger ↔ Jaguar ↔ 虎门 Hǔmén Humen 2YellowLionManes 黄河 Huáng Hé

𓐍𓅓𓀨𓂡 harm
𓐍𓂋𓊤 cry vs 𓎼𓂋𓀁 calm opposites

⇔
唱 chang4 CHANT SING call chàng:唱:⿰口昌 koǔ chāng

≠ how ≠ who ϩⲟϥ 𓆑
